title: Investigations on particle emissions of large-bore engines powered by natural gas and hydrogen
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00200H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Felina Armbruster, Alexander Gelner, Andreas Zepf, Maximilian Prager, Martin Härtl, Malte Jaensch
This research provides the first insights into the particle emissions of large-bore engines powered by natural gas and hydrogen, identifying an increased lubricating oil influence in hydrogen engines.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
